metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7295 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The (1) Special:Preferences and (2) Special:UserLogin pages in MediaWikibefore 1.19.20, 1.22.x before 1.22.12 and 1.23.x before 1.23.5 allowsremote authenticated users to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks orhave unspecified other impact via crafted CSS, as demonstrated by modifyingMediaWiki:Common.css.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
